Text:
This is a very High Quality rip, I know most people want this album in high quality but also in a format that is natively supported under windows so i went with the wma format for compatibility and chose the highest setting possible under windows media player 12.

Enjoy and let me know in the comments if you want other tool albums in the wma format and i will upload them.
Thanks for the great quality upload. I tested this with audiochecker after converting it to FLAC and it is 100% Lossless.
